casebody.data:
JONES
v.
CRANFORD 80P18-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 7, 2018 Darron J. Jones, for Jones, Darron J.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of April 2018 by Plaintiff to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of June 2018."
